basic.name: Transfer IT - 30ml
basic.short_description: Professional stencil application gel for perfect transfers

content.full_description:
Transfer IT is a premium stencil application gel designed specifically for professional tattoo artists who demand precision and reliability. This advanced formula creates the perfect adhesive layer between skin and stencil, ensuring sharp, clear transfers that stay put throughout your session.

Developed through years of collaboration with working tattoo artists, Transfer IT delivers consistent results across all skin types and stencil methods. Its unique formulation prevents smudging during application while maintaining optimal stencil clarity for hours, even during extended sessions.

The 30ml bottle provides enough product for approximately 40-50 applications, making it both economical and practical for busy studios. The hypoallergenic, vegan formula contains no harsh chemicals, ensuring client comfort while delivering professional results every time.

Whether you're working with thermal stencils, carbon paper transfers, or hand-drawn designs, Transfer IT provides the reliable foundation your artwork deserves. Join thousands of professional artists who trust Transfer IT for their stencil application needs.
content.usage_instructions:
1. Clean and prepare the skin area thoroughly, ensuring it's dry and free from oils.
2. Shake the Transfer IT bottle well before use.
3. Apply a thin, even layer of Transfer IT to the prepared skin area using clean fingers or a disposable applicator.
4. Wait 10-15 seconds for the gel to become slightly tacky.
5. Place your stencil firmly on the prepared area, pressing evenly across the entire design.
6. Hold in place for 5-10 seconds, then carefully peel away the stencil backing.
7. Allow the transfer to dry completely (1-2 minutes) before beginning your tattoo work.
content.ingredients: Aqua (Water), Glycerin, PVP (Polyvinylpyrrolidone), Propylene Glycol, Chamomilla Recutita (Chamomile) Extract, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Citric Acid
content.warnings: For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes. If irritation occurs, discontinue use. Keep out of reach of children. Store in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight. Do not use on broken, irritated, or infected skin.

features: Creates perfect stencil adhesion on all skin types
Prevents smudging during application and tattooing
Hypoallergenic and vegan formula
Contains soothing chamomile and aloe extracts
Long-lasting hold for extended tattoo sessions
Works with thermal, carbon, and hand-drawn stencils
30ml bottle provides 40-50 applications
Quick-drying, non-greasy finish

seo.meta_title: Transfer IT 30ml - Professional Tattoo Stencil Gel | Electric Ink IE
seo.meta_description: Premium stencil application gel for perfect tattoo transfers. Hypoallergenic, vegan formula. Long-lasting hold. Fast shipping across Ireland. Shop now!

basic.name: Slimer Gel - 90ml
basic.short_description: Professional tattoo gel that reduces redness and irritation during sessions

content.full_description:
Slimer Gel is a revolutionary professional tattoo gel formulated to enhance both artist performance and client comfort during tattoo sessions. This advanced water-based gel creates an optimal glide surface while actively reducing skin irritation and inflammation, allowing you to work longer with better results.

The unique formula combines lubricating properties with skin-soothing botanical extracts, creating a protective barrier that minimizes trauma to the skin during the tattooing process. Unlike traditional petroleum-based products, Slimer Gel won't clog pores or interfere with ink absorption, ensuring vibrant, true color results.

Designed for professional use, the 90ml bottle provides excellent value with enough product for multiple large-scale tattoos. The gel's optimal viscosity ensures it stays where you apply it without running or drying out, maintaining consistent performance throughout even the longest sessions.

Trusted by professional tattoo artists across Ireland and Europe, Slimer Gel has become an essential tool for artists who prioritize both quality results and client comfort. Its hypoallergenic, vegan formula makes it suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin.
content.usage_instructions:
1. Ensure the tattoo area is clean, dry, and properly prepared with your stencil.
2. Apply a thin layer of Slimer Gel to the working area using a clean applicator or gloved hand.
3. Begin tattooing immediately - the gel provides instant lubrication.
4. Reapply as needed throughout the session, typically every 15-20 minutes or when the surface feels less smooth.
5. Wipe away excess gel and ink regularly with a clean paper towel to maintain visibility.
6. After completing the tattoo, wipe away all remaining gel with a damp cloth.
7. Follow with your standard aftercare protocol.
content.ingredients: Aqua (Water), Glycerin, Carbomer, Propylene Glycol, Witch Hazel (Hamamelis Virginiana) Extract, Calendula Officinalis Flower Extract, Chamomilla Recutita (Chamomile) Extract, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Triethanolamine, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Menthol
content.warnings: For professional use only. For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes and mucous membranes. Do not use on broken, infected, or inflamed skin prior to tattooing. Discontinue use if irritation occurs. Keep out of reach of children. Store in a cool, dry place.

features: Reduces redness and skin irritation during tattooing
Creates optimal glide surface for smoother needle work
Water-based formula won't interfere with ink absorption
Contains soothing witch hazel, calendula, and chamomile
Non-greasy, won't clog pores or create buildup
Maintains consistent viscosity throughout session
90ml bottle provides excellent value for busy studios
Hypoallergenic and vegan-friendly formula

seo.meta_title: Slimer Gel 90ml - Professional Tattoo Gel for Smooth Work | Electric Ink IE
seo.meta_description: Premium tattoo gel reduces irritation and redness. Water-based, vegan formula with botanical extracts. Perfect glide for professional artists. Shop Ireland!

basic.name: Pro Cartridges – Round Liner Ø 0.22
basic.tagline: More detail, more control, finer than ever.
basic.short_description: Professional Round Liner cartridge. 0.22mm needle diameter. Pack of 20 units.

content.full_description:
Electric Ink Pro Cartridges – Round Liner 0.22 are designed for artists who demand maximum precision and delicate line work. Featuring Super Long Taper needles with an ultra-fine diameter, they are ideal for highly detailed techniques and small-scale tattoos.

Developed with Electric Ink's advanced safety system, these cartridges feature a silicone membrane that prevents ink, blood, or fluid backflow, protecting both your machine and your client. A secure locking system ensures cartridge stability for smoother and more controlled punctures.
content.usage_instructions:
1. Remove cartridge from sterile packaging immediately before use
2. Insert cartridge firmly into your compatible cartridge machine
3. Ensure secure connection and proper alignment
4. Test needle protrusion at safe distance before skin contact
5. Adjust machine settings according to technique and skin type
6. After use, dispose of cartridge immediately in sharps container

Never reuse cartridges. Always use fresh, sterile cartridges for each client.
content.materials: Surgical-grade stainless steel needles, medical-grade plastic housing, silicone safety membrane
content.warnings: For professional use only. Single use only - do not reuse or resterilize. Dispose of properly in approved sharps container. Keep out of reach of children. Use only with compatible cartridge machines. Ensure proper sterilization protocols are followed.
content.disclaimer: Our suggestions are not rules. Each artist should test different models to find what best suits their setup and style.

features: Super Long Taper needles for maximum precision
0.22mm ultra-fine needle diameter (#08)
Silicone membrane safety system prevents backflow
Secure locking system for cartridge stability
Surgical-grade stainless steel needles
Medical-grade plastic housing
EO Gas sterilized - individually packaged
Universal fit - compatible with all cartridge machines
Pack of 20 units
Designed and tested by Electric Ink R&D team

specifications.sterilization: EO Gas - individually sterilised and inspected
specifications.storage: Store in cool, dry place away from direct sunlight

variant_config.label: Needle Configuration
variant_config.description: Select the number of needles (configuration) for your technique. Higher configurations create bolder lines.

variants.label: RL01 - 1 needle
variants.description: Single needle configuration for ultra-fine lines and maximum precision. Perfect for micro-realism and extremely detailed work.

specifications.best_for: Micro-realism, ultra-fine lines, tiny script, minute details

variants.label: RL03 - 3 needles
variants.description: 3 needle configuration for fine lines and small details. Ideal for small lettering and detailed line work.

specifications.best_for: Fine lines, small script, portrait details, delicate outlines

variants.label: RL05 - 5 needles
variants.description: 5 needle configuration for medium lines. Versatile choice for general line work and outlines.

specifications.best_for: Standard outlines, medium script, general line work, portrait outlines

variants.label: RL07 - 7 needles
variants.description: 7 needle configuration for bold lines. Great for strong outlines and visible line work.

specifications.best_for: Bold outlines, large script, strong line work, prominent details

variants.label: RL09 - 9 needles
variants.description: 9 needle configuration for thick lines. Maximum visibility and impact for bold designs.

specifications.best_for: Thick outlines, large-scale designs, bold script, high-impact lines
